mapper.insert: insert into payment (imp_uid, merchant_uid, user_email, pay_date, amount, card_no, refund, bizAccount_email, hotdeal_NUM) values (#{imp_uid}, #{merchant_uid}, #{user_email}, #{pay_date}, #{amount}, #{card_no}, #{refund}, #{bizAccount_email}, #{hotdeal_NUM});
mapper.delete: delete from payment where merchant_uid = #{merchant_uid} AND user_email = #{user_email} AND pay_date = #{pay_date}
